title: VR-Based Integrated Elementary Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education experience and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A program designed for current elementary teachers to effectively integrate VR technology into science classes, utilizing diverse VR tools and developing curriculum applications in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate and select two or more VR contents suitable for science lesson design.
Can design one project-based science lesson module utilizing VR technology
Can resolve over 80% of technical issues that may arise in VR education within a BYOD environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
